LanguageData.Abrasive.degreeDatas.abrasive.label: abrasive
LanguageData.Abrasive.degreeDatas.abrasive.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] always says exactly what's on [PAWN_possessive] mind, especially if it's bugging [PAWN_objective]. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
LanguageData.AnnoyingVoice.degreeDatas.annoying_voice: [PAWN_nameDef]'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and [PAWN_pronoun] tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.Ascetic.degreeDatas.ascetic.label: ascetic
LanguageData.Ascetic.degreeDatas.ascetic.description: [PAWN_nameDef] prefers to live in asceticism. [PAWN_pronoun] will be put in a poor mood if [PAWN_pronoun] has a bedroom that's too impressive. [PAWN_pronoun] also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw - and raw food won't bother [PAWN_objective] a bit.
LanguageData.Asexual.degreeDatas.asexual.label: TODO
LanguageData.Bisexual.degreeDatas.bisexual.label: TODO
LanguageData.Bloodlust.degreeDatas.bloodlust.label: bloodlust
LanguageData.Bloodlust.degreeDatas.bloodlust.descript: [PAWN_nameDef] gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. [PAWN_pronoun] is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
LanguageData.BodyPurist.degreeDatas.body_purist.label: body purist
LanguageData.BodyPurist.degreeDatas.body_purist.descr: [PAWN_nameDef] believes the human body is limited for a reason. To [PAWN_objective], artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
LanguageData.Brawler.degreeDatas.brawler.label: brawler
LanguageData.Brawler.degreeDatas.brawler.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to fight up close and personal. [PAWN_possessive] accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but [PAWN_pronoun]'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.Cannibal.degreeDatas.cannibal.label: cannibal
LanguageData.Cannibal.degreeDatas.cannibal.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, [PAWN_pronoun] tried it... and [PAWN_pronoun] liked it.
LanguageData.CreepyBreathing.degreeDatas.creepy_breat: [PAWN_nameDef] breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
LanguageData.DislikesMen.degreeDatas.misandrist.label: misandrist
LanguageData.FastLearner.degreeDatas.fast_learner.des: [PAWN_nameDef] has a knack for learning. [PAWN_pronoun] picks things up much faster than others.
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.gay.label: gay
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.gay.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is romantically attracted to people of [PAWN_possessive] own gender.
LanguageData.Gourmand.degreeDatas.gourmand.label: gourmand
LanguageData.Gourmand.degreeDatas.gourmand.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]'s life revolves around food. [PAWN_pronoun] gets hungry quickly, and if [PAWN_pronoun] is in a bad mood, [PAWN_pronoun] will often satisfy [PAWN_objective]self by eating.
LanguageData.GreatMemory.degreeDatas.great_memory.des: [PAWN_nameDef] has a fantastic memory for detail. [PAWN_pronoun] will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
LanguageData.Greedy.degreeDatas.greedy.label: greedy
LanguageData.Greedy.degreeDatas.greedy.description: [PAWN_nameDef] needs a really impressive bedroom. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood loss if [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't get what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.
LanguageData.Indoorsman.degreeDatas.0.label: indoorsman
LanguageData.Indoorsman.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has no need to experience the outdoors. [PAWN_pronoun] will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long [PAWN_pronoun] stays inside.
LanguageData.Jealous.degreeDatas.jealous.label: jealous
LanguageData.Jealous.degreeDatas.jealous.description: For [PAWN_nameDef], it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Kind.degreeDatas.kind.label: kind
LanguageData.Kind.degreeDatas.kind.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a nice person. [PAWN_pronoun] has a tendency to brighten everyone else's day and never insults others.
LanguageData.Masochist.degreeDatas.masochist.label: masochist
LanguageData.Masochist.degreeDatas.masochist.descript: For [PAWN_nameDef], there's something exciting about getting hurt. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't know why, [PAWN_pronoun]'s just wired differently.
LanguageData.NightOwl.degreeDatas.night_owl.label: night owl
LanguageData.NightOwl.degreeDatas.night_owl.descripti:
[PAWN_nameDef] likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

[PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

[PAWN_pronoun] doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
LanguageData.Nimble.degreeDatas.nimble.label: nimble
LanguageData.Nimble.degreeDatas.nimble.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. [PAWN_pronoun] seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
LanguageData.Nudist.degreeDatas.nudist.label: nudist
LanguageData.Nudist.degreeDatas.nudist.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. [PAWN_pronoun] can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
LanguageData.Psychopath.degreeDatas.psychopath.label: psychopath
LanguageData.Psychopath.degreeDatas.psychopath.descri: [PAWN_nameDef] has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother [PAWN_objective] at all. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] also feels no mood boost from socializing.
LanguageData.Pyromaniac.degreeDatas.pyromaniac.label: pyromaniac
LanguageData.Pyromaniac.degreeDatas.pyromaniac.descri: [PAWN_nameDef] loves fire. [PAWN_pronoun] will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, [PAWN_pronoun] will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if [PAWN_possessive] mood is low.
LanguageData.QuickSleeper.degreeDatas.quick_sleeper.d: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether [PAWN_pronoun]'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, [PAWN_pronoun] will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
LanguageData.TooSmart.degreeDatas.too_smart.label: too smart
LanguageData.TooSmart.degreeDatas.too_smart.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] is too smart for [PAWN_possessive] own good. [PAWN_pronoun] learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
LanguageData.Tough.degreeDatas.tough.label: tough
LanguageData.Tough.degreeDatas.tough.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. [PAWN_pronoun] takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely hard to kill.
LanguageData.Transhumanist.degreeDatas.body_modder.de: [PAWN_nameDef] feels limited in [PAWN_possessive] feeble human body. [PAWN_pronoun] often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
LanguageData.Wimp.degreeDatas.wimp.label: wimp
LanguageData.Wimp.degreeDatas.wimp.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize [PAWN_objective].
